title: Hour 2 - Albert Breer (03-31-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Albert Breer (03-31-20)
description:
Jason Smith and Rob Parker fill in for Dan Patrick and talk about what fans are watching while there’s a nationwide sports hiatus and weigh in on whether or not Tom Brady is the right fit for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. Plus, Albert Breer stops by to detail Tom Brady's decision to sign with the Bucs!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
